column4: I have problem with the wireless card in my toshiba laptop A210-183.... the card as it seems is RTL8187B
siakattack are you running 64 bit or 32 bit
<siakattackj> is there a 64 bit xp driver for your card
i think this is the problem because in forums other people with 32 bit and ndiswrapper had no problem
is there a 64 bit xp driver for your card  that's a question??
if there is no 64 bit xp driver for your card you are out of luck unless you want to use the 32 bit version of ubuntu
i don't have a problem to use a 32 bit driver if it works
u can't use a 32bit driver on 64bit siaka
ooooo.... i hope the problem to be solved soon
although thanks a lot for helping me
siaka you'll need to wait for ndiswrapper to support vista drivers
ok.. i hope it won't take too long because i need the wireless
